description: "Map based on the expeditions of Jean-François de Surville, a merchant captain with the French East India Company. Some details are from the diary of the French Navy officer Théobald René, Comte de Kergariou-Locmaria, who explored the region in 1785."
title: "Carte des Isles de la Sonde et du Détroit de Malaca dressée sur les mémoires de monssieur de Surville, capitaine des Vaisseaux de la Compagnie"
